descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new player house area that can be accessed through the five vanilla houses available in Skyrim.  You do need the corresponding key to get into one of the houses.  The key to get into the Secret Room is the key needed to get into the house that the door is in.  

This mod has:
A Library (holds 1734 books)
A Mannequin room (has 40 mannequins)
An Armory room (holds 252 weapons)
An Enchanting room
An Alchemy room (with plants)
A Complete Smithing room (with mine)
A full service merchant (will buy stolen goods)
And a Bedroom

This is still a work in progress later updates will have:
Wall mounts for weapons
Better room decorations
And possibly a housecarl
author: anumbskull
